Translations.Text: Ware wa, anata no mune o hirogenakatta ka
Anata kara omoni o kudashitade wanai ka
Sore wa, anata no senaka o oshitsukete ita
Mata ware wa, anata no meisei o takametade wanai ka
Hontoni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa ari
hontoni kon'nan to tomoni, anraku wa aru
Sore de (tomen no tsutome kara) raku ni nattara, sarani roku shite
(tada hitosuji ni) anata no omo ni keito suruga i
Ichijiku to oribu ni oite
shinaizan ni oite
mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau)
Hontoni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushi sugata ni tsukutta
Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta
Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hosho ga arou
Naze sore demo, omae wa shukyo (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka
Arra wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka
Yome,`sozo nasa reru okata, anata no omo no o nanioite
Ichi gyoketsu kara, ningen o tsukura reta
Yome,`anata no omo wa, saiko no sonki de arare
hitsu ni yotte (kaku koto o) oshie rareta okata
Ningen ni michi naru koto o oshie rareta okatadearu
Iya, ningen wa hontoni hogaide
jibun de nani mo tarinai tokoro wa nai to kangaete iru
Hontoni anata no omo ni (subete no mono wa) kisa reru nodearu
Anata wa, soshi suru mono o mita ka
hitori no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, reihai o sasageru toki ni
Anata wa, kare (soshi suru mono) ga,(tadashi michi) ni michibika rete iru to omou no ka
Keishin o susumete iru ka
(shinri o) usodearu to shite se o muketa to omou no ka
Kare wa, arra ga mite ora reru koto o shiranai no ka
Danjite sode wanai. Moshi kare ga tome nainaraba, ware wa maegami de kare o toraerudearou
uso-tsuki de, tsumibukai maegami o
Soshite kare no (kyujo no tame ni) ichimi o shoshu sa se nasai
Ware wa kanshu (no tenshi) o shoshu surudearou
Danjite so arubekide wanai. Anata wa kare ni shitagatte wa naranai. Ichizu ni sajida shite (omoni) chikadzuke. 〔Sajida〕
hontoni ware wa, mitsu no yoru ni, kono (kuruan) o kudashita
Mitsu no yoru ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Mitsu no yoru wa, sen tsuki yori mo masaru
(Sono yoru) tenshi-tachi to seirei wa,-nushi no yurushi no moto ni, subete no kami inochi o motarashite kudaru
Akatsuki no akeru made,(soreha) heiandearu
Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo tashinkyo to mo, kare-ra ni meisho ga kuru made,(-do kara) hanareyou to shinakatta
Mata arra kara no shito ga, jun Seina shokan o, yonde kika seru made wa
Sono nakaniha, fumetsu no tadashi kiroku (okite) ga aru
Keiten o sazukatte iru-sha-tachi ga, bunpa shita no wa, meisho ga kare-ra ni kite kara ato no kotodeatta

Kare-ra no meiji rareta koto wa, tada arra ni tsukae, kare ni shinjin no makoto o tsukushi, junsei ni fukuju, kie shite, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai to, iu dake no kotodeatta. Kore koso shinsei no oshiedearu
Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo, tashinkyo to mo, jigoku no hi ni (nagekoma re)te, sono naka ni eien ni sumu. Korera wa, shujo no naka saiaku no monodearu
Daga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu-sha-tachi, korera wa, shujo no naka saizen no monodearu

Kare-ra e no hosho wa,-nushi no omoto no, kawa ga shita o nagareru eien no endearu. Eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou. Arra wa kare-ra o yorokoba re, kare-ra mo kare ni man'etsu suru. Sore wa omo o osoreru mono (e no hosho)dearu
Daichi ga hageshiku yure
daichi ga sono omoni o nagedashi
kare (daichi) ni nanigoto ga okotta no ka.' To hito ga iu toki
Sonohi (daichi wa) subete no shosoku o katarou
anata no omo ga keiji sa reta koto o
Sonohi, hitobito wa bunbetsu sa reta shudan to natte (chichu kara) susumidete, kare-ra no okonatta koto ga shimesa rerudearou
Ichimijin no omo-sa demo, zen o okonatta mono wa sore o miru
Ichimijin no omo-sa demo, aku o okonatta mono wa sore o miru
Hakuiki araku shingeki suru (uma) ni oite (chikau)
Hidzume ni hibana o chirashi
akatsuki ni kyushu shite
sajin o makiage
(teki no) gunzei no mattadanaka ni totsunyu suru toki
Hontoni ningen wa, jibun no omo ni taishi onshirazudearu
Sore ni tsuki, kare wa makotoni shonindeari
mata tomi o aisuru koto ni netchu suru
